name: Golden Latte
preparation: In a cup or mug, stir latte mix with hot water until dissolved.
Pour milk into a large, microwave-safe measuring cup. Microwave on high 1 min, or until milk starts to bubble. Using Air Wand or whisk, beat until frothy.
Pour frothed milk into cup containing latte mixture. Sprinkle with cinnamon, if desired.
tips: Try it iced! Stir 1 heaping tbsp of latte mix into 1⁄2 cup hot water to dissolve. Add 1⁄2 cup cold milk and pour over ice. Serve blended, if desired.

products.name: Golden Latte Latte Mix
summary: Skip pricey coffee shop drinks and make your own Golden Latte – an Indian-inspired hot beverage – at home. One tin makes up to 12 servings for $1.14 each!
